problem: Were weather phenomena avoided when naming minor league baseball teams?
gt_solution:
Weather phenomena refers to types of weather caused conditions such as cyclones, storms, and tsunamis.
Minor league baseball teams include the Brooklyn Cyclones and Lake Elsinore Storm.
facts: Weather phenomena refers to types of weather caused conditions such as cyclones, storms, and tsunamis.
Minor league baseball teams include the Brooklyn Cyclones and Lake Elsinore Storm.
decomposition: What are some names of weather phenomena?
What are the name of minor league baseball teams?
Are any terms in #1 also present in #2?
